subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN3089, how did it go?
description_text: Still waiting for my parcel to arrive. Sent from my iPhone On 24 Nov 2025, at 16:58, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote: ﻿ Hello Chloe, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ Hello Chloe, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. Simsonn HB Pro Racing Simulator Handbrake Standard Dislike it Love it! Unsubscribe

conversations.body_text: Hi Chloe Anniss,    We apologize for the delay and inconvenience caused. Your package is expected to arrive within the next couple of days.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045993559382
